FOOTER.developers: Developed by: Ann Shutko | Pavel Ryndyn | Semen Synytsyn | Sergey Denisenko

current_page.content: On this page we can observe the current state of the sensors. We get this data from the BMP280 sensor, which is attached to the Arduino Mega.

statistic_page.content: On this page we can observe graphs of changes of each sensor. You can select the time range for which the graph will be built.
